Treatments

On this page you will find a few examples of the issues which we treat and what you might expect from us if you were to use our services for that particular issue. There is also pricing estimates for each issue at the bottom of the page!

Examples of Issues

Aggression

One of the issues which you may face from your feline friend is aggressive behaviour.
Examples of this kind of behaviour can range from hissing and backing into a corner, to actually physically attacking you and drawing blood.
Here at The Cat Therapist, we approach these types of issues gently and look at where the issue could be coming from from all angles!

Fear and Anxiety

If you cat is suddenly hiding from you or walking around and holding its tail between its legs, then these are symptoms of anxiety. There could be a number of things causing this for your poor cat and we here at The Cat Therapist are dedicated to helping you find the cause.

Bad Toilet Habits

Sometimes our cats can suddenly stop knowing how to use their litter tray and this can put a big strain on us as their owner having to clean up the mess. This can be due to a number of reasons, i.e. A change in their home environment, an underlying medical issue or something threatening them from outside their home. We at The Cat Therapist look at all avenues and get your kitty back to using their toilet again!
